CreateOIDCProvider.title: CreateOIDCProvider
CreateOIDCProvider.summary: Creates an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP) to configure a trust relationship between Alibaba Cloud and an external IdP. This topic provides an example on how to create an IdP named TestOIDCProvider to configure a trust relationship between the external IdP Okta and Alibaba Cloud.
